abstract: Shares of Lending Club rise 3 percent after peer-to-peer lending company reports better-than-expected adjusted profit of 2 cents a share on revenue of $81.2 million.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Lending Club, a peer-to-peer lender, advanced 3 percent Wednesday after the company reported better-than-expected results and raised its full-year outlook.

headline.main: Lending Club Raises Its Outlook for the Year
headline.print_headline: Lending Club Raises Its Outlook for the Year

snippet: Shares of Lending Club, a peer-to-peer lender, advanced 3 percent Wednesday after the company reported better-than-expected results and raised its full-year outlook.
